**Create a container**

curl --request POST \
  --url http://localhost:9000/containers \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Auth-Token: eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..jybnQyDLl5ZWnhHqxiFU6peX1zsq7ZzO7aKdIv54_mk' \
  --data '{
    "name":"Container1",
    "keys": {
        "key": "Key 1"
    },
    "type": {
        "key":"TypeA1"
    },
    "repository": {
        "key":"REPO1"
    }
}'

**Get a container by key**

curl --request GET \
  --url http://localhost:9000/containers/KEY%201 \
  --header 'X-Auth-Token: eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..jybnQyDLl5ZWnhHqxiFU6peX1zsq7ZzO7aKdIv54_mk'
